summary: The Kaaba is a special stone building at the center of the most important mosque in Islam, located in Mecca, Saudi Arabia. Muslims believe it is the "House of God" and face it when they pray. The current Kaaba was built after a fire damaged the original one in 683 CE. Muslims used to pray facing Jerusalem, but later changed to face the Kaaba. People circle the Kaaba seven times during the Hajj pilgrimage. Millions of pilgrims visit every year, especially during Ramadan.
title: Kaaba
